TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetworkCredential extends System.Object implements class System.Net.ICredentials, class System.Net.ICredentialsByHost
Public Class NetworkCredential Implements ICredentials, ICredentialsByHost
public ref class NetworkCredential : System::Net::ICredentials, System::Net::ICredentialsByHost
type NetworkCredential = class interface ICredentials interface ICredentialsByHost

summary.span: 为基于密码的身份验证方案（如基本、摘要式、NTLM 和 Kerberos 身份验证）提供凭据。

span.span: Provides credentials for password-based authentication schemes such as basic, digest, NTLM, and Kerberos authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个基类，它提供在基于密码的身份验证方案，例如，基本、 摘要式、 NTLM 和 Kerberos 凭据。The class is a base class that supplies credentials in password-based authentication schemes such as basic, digest, NTLM, and Kerberos. 类实现接口，如类中，返回对象。Classes that implement the interface, such as the class, return objects. 此类不支持公共基于密钥的身份验证方法，如安全套接字层 (SSL) 客户端身份验证。This class does not support public key-based authentication methods such as Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) client authentication. ## Examples 下面的代码示例相关联对象具有一系列统一资源标识符 (Uri) 中。The following code example associates a object with a set of Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) in a . 然后将其传递到对象，使用它来与 Internet 服务器的请求进行身份验证。It then passes the to a object, which uses it to authenticate requests to an Internet server. [!code-cpp[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置验证凭据的域名或计算机名。

span.span: Gets or sets the domain or computer name that verifies the credentials.
The name of the domain associated with the credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的域或领域所属用户名称。The property specifies the domain or realm to which the user name belongs. 通常情况下，这是应用程序运行所在的主机计算机名或当前登录用户的用户域。Typically, this is the host computer name where the application runs or the user domain for the currently logged in user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来设置与凭据关联的域。The following code example uses the property to set the domain associated with the credentials.
